text: Ri winaq ri kakꞌam na bꞌik pa cheꞌ, kakꞌam na bꞌik riꞌ. Ri kakamisan na chi sakꞌibꞌal, chi sakꞌibꞌal riꞌ kakamisax na.13:10 We jupaj tzij riꞌ pa juleꞌ taq tzij chik jewaꞌ kubꞌij: We kꞌo ne jun keꞌ pa cheꞌ, keꞌ na kꞌu riꞌ rumal jeriꞌ karaj ri Dios, je xuqujeꞌ we kakamisax chi sakꞌibꞌal, jeriꞌ riꞌ kakꞌulmatajik. Are waꞌ ri kakꞌutuwik chi ri kojonelabꞌ jas jeqel kikꞌuꞌx chirij ri Dios.
